dmca.title: [ABUSE] Unauthorised used of Godskitchen Trademarks
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, August 17, 2005 12:47 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Unauthorised used of Godskitchen Trademarks]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

- -------- Original Message --------
Received: from [172.16.214.181] (helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com)        by
mail.theplanet.com with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)        (Exim
4.50)        id 1E53iB-0000S0-Ry        for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Tue, 16 Aug 2005
10:50:47 -0500
Received: from spooling.theplanet.com ([69.56.141.4]
helo=lili.theplanet.com)        by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)        with smtp (Exim)        id
1E53iA-000LgA-5n
for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Tue, 16 Aug 2005 10:50:47 -0500
Received: (qmail 752 invoked from network); 16 Aug 2005 15:50:46 -0000
Received: from unknown (HELO ?216.185.111.52?) (172.16.214.110)  by
lili.theplanet.com with SMTP; 16 Aug 2005 15:50:45 -0000
Received: from [172.16.214.180] (helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com)        by
mail.theplanet.com with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)        (Exim
4.50) id 1E53i8-0000Rb-7V        for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 16 Aug 2005
10:50:44 -0500
Received: from centaur.titaninternet.co.uk ([217.77.187.18])        by
mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
copyright@angelmusicgroup.com)
with esmtps (SSLv3:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1E53i1-000I8T-Mq for
abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 16 Aug 2005 10:50:44 -0500
Received: from [192.168.1.91] ([217.31.156.90])        by
centaur.titaninternet.co.uk (Merak 7.6.4) with ASMTP id GOK38416;        Tue,
16 Aug 2005 16:41:45 +0100
Message-ID: <43020B44.8000507@angelmusicgroup.com>
Date: Tue, 16 Aug 2005 16:50:28 +0100
From: AMG Copyright Control <copyright@angelmusicgroup.com>
Organization: Angel Music Group
User-Agent: Mozilla Thunderbird 1.0.2 (Windows/20050317)
X-Accept-Language: en-us, en
MIME-Version: 1.0
To: webmaster@brandsoftheworld.com,  abuse@theplanet.com
X-Priority: 1 (Highest)
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1; format=flowed
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
Received-SPF: none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 217.77.187.18 is neither
permitted nor denied by domain of angelmusicgroup.com)
client-ip=217.77.187.18;        envelope-from=copyright@angelmusicgroup.com;
helo=centaur.titaninternet.co.uk;
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -99.7
Cc:
Subject: [ABUSE] Unauthorised used of Godskitchen Trademarks
X-BeenThere: abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.5
Precedence: list
List-Id: abuse.lists.theplanet.com
List-Unsubscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post: <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help: <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -99.7

Dear Webmaster,

It has come to my attention that some copyright and Trademark material is
being made available on the website "www.brandsoftheworld.com"
without the consent of Angel Music Group.

The items in question are available on your website at:

http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/search/?query_id=82165&page=1&mtype=&brand_i
d=49429
(Godskitchen Old Logo)

http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/search/?query_id=82165&page=1&mtype=&brand_i
d=72480
(Godskitchen Current Logo)

These images are both the Intellectual Property of Angel Music Group, their
subsidiaries or agents; and appear on your website without authorisation of
the Rights Owner.

Please arrange for these images to be removed from your website forthwith.

Many thanks,
Scott Bickerton

- --
Copyright Control
Angel Music Group Limited
PO Box 11492
Henley In Arden
B95 6WG
- - - - -
Tel:    0845 009 8888
Fax:    0845 009 8889
Int:    +44 (0)1926 840 301
Fax:    +44 (0)1926 840 306

Email:  copyright@angelmusicgroup.com
Web:    www.angelmusicgroup.com
- - - - -
Angel Music Group is part of the Angel Music Group of Companies.
Internet communications are not secure and therefore Angel Music Group and
its subsidiaries does not accept legal responsibility for the contents of
this message. Although Angel Music Group and its subsidiaries operates
anti-virus programmes it does not accept responsibility for any damage
whatsoever that is caused by viruses being passed. Any views or opinions
presented are solely those of the author and do not represent those of Angel
Music Group or its subsidiaries unless specifically stated. This email and
any files transmitted with it are confidential and intended solely for the
use of the individual or entity to which they are addressed. If you have
received this email in error please notify postmaster@angelmusicgroup.com
immediately.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -



- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
